label: State changes sum to 0 in registry

from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Bit-parity conservation: State changes sum to 0
# Total parity across all 288 roots preserved
# 125 + 163 = 288 maintains even parity

total_parity = (hidden + visible) % 2  # = 0

# FOUNDATIONAL: Information theoretic axiom
parity_conserved = (total_parity == 0)
